T02TD1705E:62a-1: a'ary'a t'a re mandala bi dhi n'a ma s'a dha n'am /
T02TD1705E:62a-3: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub thabs cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02TD1705E:62a-4: dpal dgyes pa'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1705E:62a-5: bla ma dam pa'i zhabs kyi ni //
T02TD1705E:62a-6: padma la gus phyag byas te //
T02TD1705E:62a-7: 'phags ma sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02TD1705E:62a-8: man ngag rgyud la brten pa bri //
T02TD1705E:62a-9: bla ma la gus dad pa che //
T02TD1705E:62a-10: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje che //
T02TD1705E:62a-11: rtog pa legs par 'joms pa des //
T02TD1705E:62a-12: rje btsun mnyes byas man ngag mnos //
T02TD1705E:62a-13: dang por dben zhing nyams dga' bar //
T02TD1705E:62a-14: nyer spyod yo byad rdzogs par bya //
T02TD1705E:62a-15: de nas byang chub sems bskyed la //
T02TD1705E:62a-16: phyag dang mchod dang gsol ba gdab //
T02TD1705E:62a-17: rjes su yi rang bsngo ba sogs //
T02TD1705E:62a-18: byas te tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom //
T02TD1705E:62a-19: de nas gzung 'dzin brtan g-yo kun //
T02TD1705E:62a-20: stong par byas te sngags bzlas bya //
T02TD1705E:62a-21: aom sv'a bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a wa shuddhonyaham /
T02TD1705E:62a-23: de yi ngang las h'um bsams te //
T02TD1705E:62a-24: ra ba gur dang phyogs mtshams bcing //
T02TD1705E:62a-25: khro bo bcu yi srung 'khor bsgom //
T02TD1705E:62a-26: de steng ae las chos 'byung bsam //
T02TD1705E:62a-27: lam bam ram yam rnams las ni //
T02TD1705E:62a-28: sa chu me rlung dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02TD1705E:62a-29: de steng du brum las 'khor lo'o //
T02TD1705E:62a-30: der ni n'a da babs pa las //
T02TD1705E:62a-31: bsgyur te gzhal yas khang bsam bya //
T02TD1705E:62a-32: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02TD1705E:62a-33: ka ba brgyad mdzes rgyan ldan bsam //
T02TD1705E:62a-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ta la badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1705E:62a-36: de nang pam las padma ni //
T02TD1705E:62a-38: dbus su a'a li k'a li las //
T02TD1705E:62a-39: nyi zla ga 'ur bsam par bya //
T02TD1705E:62a-40: dbus su yi ge t'am ser bsam //
T02TD1705E:62a-41: de ltar k'a li aar gyur pas //
T02TD1705E:62b-0: mnyam sbyar @62b de gnyis gyur par bsam //
T02TD1705E:62b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa nu rakto badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1705E:62b-3: de ltar dbus kyi t'a las ni //
T02TD1705E:62b-4: shar gyi nyi ma'i bar du ni //
T02TD1705E:62b-5: yi ge aom gyi rnam par spros //
T02TD1705E:62b-6: lhor ni t'a dang nub tu re //
T02TD1705E:62b-7: byang du rgyu yi yi ge spro //
T02TD1705E:62b-8: de nas sgo yi phyogs dag tu //
T02TD1705E:62b-9: t'a re tu dang re bzhi spro //
T02TD1705E:62b-10: steng du t'a dang re gnyis spro //
T02TD1705E:62b-12: lhar byas sa bon thim pa las //
T02TD1705E:62b-13: rang rang sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i //
T02TD1705E:62b-14: rdo rje me tog phreng ba yis //
T02TD1705E:62b-15: mar me kong bu dung chos dang //
T02TD1705E:62b-16: lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dang //
T02TD1705E:62b-17: dril bu rnams su gyur par bsam //
T02TD1705E:62b-19: lha mo rnams su bsam par bya'o //
T02TD1705E:62b-20: de las dbus su lha mo sgrol ma ni //
T02TD1705E:62b-21: phyag brgyad zhal bzhi kha dog ser //
T02TD1705E:62b-22: rgyan ldan ma mdangs sdug lang tshor ldan //
T02TD1705E:62b-23: mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan //
T02TD1705E:62b-24: g-yo zhing padma'i gdan la bzhugs //
T02TD1705E:62b-25: rdo rje de bzhin zhags pa dang //
T02TD1705E:62b-26: mdung dang mda' ni g-yas na bsnams //
T02TD1705E:62b-28: gzhu dang sdigs mdzub g-yon ba na //
T02TD1705E:62b-29: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
T02TD1705E:62b-30: sa gsum dbang du sdud pa bsam//
T02TD1705E:62b-31: de yi shar du me tog gi //
T02TD1705E:62b-32: sgrol ma dkar mo zhal gcig ma //
T02TD1705E:62b-33: phyag gnyis me tog phreng ba 'dzin //
T02TD1705E:62b-34: rgyan rnams kun gyis spras par bsam //
T02TD1705E:62b-35: lhor ni spos kyi sgrol ma ste //
T02TD1705E:62b-36: kha dog nag mo spos 'dzin ma //
T02TD1705E:62b-37: nub tu mar me'i sgrol ma ste //
T02TD1705E:62b-38: ser zhing mar me'i snod 'dzin ma //
T02TD1705E:62b-39: byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste //
T02TD1705E:62b-40: ljang gu dri yi dud chos bsnams //
T02TD1705E:62b-41: dkyil 'khor dbus su bsgom par bya'o //
T02TD1705E:62b-42: de nas shar sgor sgo skyong dkar //
T02TD1705E:62b-43: lcags kyu 'dzin pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1705E:62b-44: lhor ser zhags pa bsam par bya //
T02TD1705E:62b-45: nub dmar lcags kyi sgrog 'dzin ma //
T02TD1705E:62b-46: byang du ljang gu dril bu'o //
T02TD1705E:62b-47: de rnams zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma //
T02TD1705E:62b-48: rin chen rgyan gyis legs spras shing //
T02TD1705E:62b-49: g-yo bcas gser gyi rna chas brgyan //
T02TD1705E:62b-50: spyan gnyis lang tsho phun sum tshogs //
T02TD1705E:62b-51: steng du rnam par sgrol ma ste //
T02TD1705E:62b-53: 'khor lo sprul zhags bsnams pa bri //
T02TD1705E:63a-2: de nas skye mched dag la ni //
T02TD1705E:63a-3: mig gnyis rna ba gnyis dang sna //
T02TD1705E:63a-4: lce dang lus dang yid rnams su //
T02TD1705E:63a-5: mam dam ai dang ram sam nam //
T02TD1705E:63a-6: gti mug zhe sdang ser sna la //
T02TD1705E:63a-7: 'dod chags phrag dog bdag med la //
T02TD1705E:63a-8: gang dang dmar dang ser mo sngo //
T02TD1705E:63a-9: ljang khu dkar mo rnams bsams te //
T02TD1705E:63a-10: zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa'o //
T02TD1705E:63a-11: sku la aom las mkha' spyod ma //
T02TD1705E:63a-12: sa spyod bdag med ma gsum las //
T02TD1705E:63a-13: rdo rje gsum po bsam par bya //
T02TD1705E:63a-15: rang bzhin gyi ni zhing khams nas //
T02TD1705E:63a-16: ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs te //
T02TD1705E:63a-17: dza: h'um bam ho: sa lha mo rnams //
T02TD1705E:63a-18: 'gugs pas dgug gzhug bcings mnyes bya //
T02TD1705E:63a-19: de nas sems dpa' gsal bar lta //
T02TD1705E:63a-21: sangs rgyas rigs lnga spyan drangs la //
T02TD1705E:63a-22: mchod bstod gsol ba gdab par bya //
T02TD1705E:63a-23: de nas dbang bskur rgyas btab ste //
T02TD1705E:63a-24: rtse mo rigs lnga rnam par mtshan //
T02TD1705E:63a-25: gzhan rnams rang gi rigs kyis gdab //
T02TD1705E:63a-26: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1705E:63a-28: de nas sa bon las spros pa'i //
T02TD1705E:63a-29: lha mo rnams kyis mchod par bya //
T02TD1705E:63a-30: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta p'u dza ma gha badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1705E:63a-32: de nas rigs kyi sa bon las //
T02TD1705E:63a-33: bdud rtsi lce la blangs byas te //
T02TD1705E:63a-34: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa mri ta badzra sv'a bh'a wa a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1705E:63a-36: de nas bstod pas legs bstod de //
T02TD1705E:63a-37: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta stu ti badzra sv'a bh'a ba a'atma konyaham /
T02TD1705E:63a-39: gsal la yang dang yang du blta'o //
T02TD1705E:63a-40: de nas sngags bzlas pa ni /
T02TD1705E:63a-41: na ma: a'arya wa lo ki te shva r'a ya /
T02TD1705E:63a-44: ma h'a k'a ru ni k'a ya /
T02TD1705E:63a-46: aom t'a re tutshha re tu re /
T02TD1705E:63a-56: sarba dusht'ana stam bha ni t'a re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1705E:63a-57: aom t'a re tutt'a re tu re sv'a h'a /
T02TD1705E:63a-58: phar phyin bcu yi lha mo la //
T02TD1705E:63b-0: las la rang sngags khri bzlas @63b so ;
T02TD1705E:63b-1: / de nas skyo na rnam dag bsgom //
T02TD1705E:63b-2: gtor ma byas te lha gshegs la //
T02TD1705E:63b-3: ci bde ba yi spyod pas gnas //
T02TD1705E:63b-4: de ltar yang dang yang goms pas //
T02TD1705E:63b-5: gcan gzan bsrung ba dang dbang du bya //
T02TD1705E:63b-6: bskrad dang bud med dgug pa dang //
T02TD1705E:63b-7: bcings ba grol dang tshar bcad dang //
T02TD1705E:63b-8: bsreg dang mnan pa bsrung ba sogs //
T02TD1705E:63b-9: rgyud thos man ngag ldan pas bsgrub //
T02TD1705E:63b-10: bla ma mnyes pa mchog yin pas //
T02TD1705E:63b-11: de yis rje btsun yun ring bsten //
T02TD1705E:63b-12: sgrub thabs bkod pa'i tshogs de yis //
T02TD1705E:63b-13: de nyid mthong bas phyag byas te //
T02TD1705E:63b-14: bla ma dam pa lhan cig skyes //
T02TD1705E:63b-15: mnyes par byas te de mthong shog rje btsun ma 'phags ma sgrol ma'i lha bcu'i sgrub pa'i thabs /
T02TD1705E:63b-16: slob dpon chen po lhan cig skyes ba'i rol bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1705E:63b-18: // /'brog mi lo ts'a bas bsgyur ba'o//
